r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Add support for memcached on PHP 8 #1558
### Fixed - Fix #1544: Handle hook dummy span hack when assigning parent #1557
### Internal changes - Add gdbinit files for php 8.0 and 8.1 #1556 - Add system tests in CI #1552 - Use latest 8.0.17 in buster images #1559 - Update flex to v1.18.5 in composer.lock files for Symfony 4.0 and 5.0 #1560 - Add a single test to xfail after upgrade of docker image to 8.0.18 #1561 - Update link to download 0.71.1 in the reliability environment #1555
